card.text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by nonsnow creatures this turn.

card.text: Search your library for a snow land, reveal it, and put it onto the battlefield tapped. If you do, shuffle your library.

card.name: Iceolation
card.text: Creatures can't be blocked by more than one creature. Creatures can't block more than one creature at a time.

card.name: Pitfall Viper
card.text: Flash When a creature dealt damage by Pitfall Viper dies this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Citizen Cleaver
card.text: Equipped creature gets +3/+0. Equip {2}

card.name: Bronze-Clad Armor
card.text: Equipped creature gets +4/+4 and has defender. Equip {3}

card.name: Snowstorm Shrine
card.text: {T}: Add {S} to your mana pool. {2}, {T}: Put an ice counter on another target land. That land becomes a snow land.

card.name: White Forest Tiger
card.text: White Forest Tiger can't be blocked by more than one creature. Mount {2}{G}{G} ({2}{G}{G}: Pair this creature with another unpaired creature you control. That creature becomes this creature's rider. This creature can't attack or block as long as it has a rider. Mount only as a sorcery.) White Forest Tiger's rider gets +3/+3 and can't be blocked by more than one creature.

card.name: Naysayer's Wane
card.text: Put target attacking creature on the bottom of its owner's library.

card.name: Powdercloak
card.text: Snow creatures gain protection from nonsnow creatures until end of turn. (It can't be blocked, targeted or dealt damage by nonsnow creatures until end of turn.)

card.name: Expansive Journey
card.text: You gain 2 life for each untapped land you control.

card.name: Caller of the Chord
card.text: Whenever a Spirit creature you control dies, you gain 3 life.

card.name: Bubble Shield
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +0/+3. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to enchanted creature.

card.name: Harpy of the Veshaa
card.text: Flying When Harpy of the Veshaa enters the battlefield, tap up to two target creatures your opponents control.

card.name: Wall of Frost
card.text: Defender Whenever Wall of Frost blocks a creature, that creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

card.name: Declare Void
card.text: Counter target spell. That spell's controller draws a card.

card.name: Sewer Ghoul
card.text: When Sewer Ghoul dies, discard your hand.

card.name: Sweet Nothings
card.text: Target player draws two cards. Then, look at that player's hand and choose up to two nonland cards from it. That player discards those cards.

card.name: Sabretooth Rat
card.text: {1}{B}, Exile a creature card from your graveyard: Target player discards two cards. Activate this ability only as a sorcery.

card.name: Panglacial Purge
card.text: Destroy target nonsnow creature.

card.name: Creepy Crawler
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, target creature you control gets +1/+0 and gains deathtouch until end of turn.

card.name: Glacial Demon
card.text: Intimidate (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.) When Glacial Demon enters the battlefield, sacrifice all other creatures you control.

card.name: Mental Torture
card.text: Enchant creature When Mental Torture becomes attached to a creature, that creature's controller may sacrifice it. At the beginning of enchanted creature's end step, that player discards a card.

card.name: Sarkhan's Terror
card.text: Flying {1}{B}{R}: Sarkhan's Terror gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Grisly Gates
card.text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield, it gets +2/+0 and gains haste until end of turn and deals 2 damage to its controller.

card.name: Goblin Messenger
card.text: Haste Whenever Goblin Messenger deals combat damage to a player, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.

card.name: Goblin Archer
card.text: {2}{R}, {T}, Discard a card: Goblin Archer deals 2 damage to target creature with flying. That creature loses flying and can't block until end of turn.

card.name: Temporary Insanity
card.text: Untap target creature with power less than the number of cards in your graveyard and gain control of it until end of turn. That creature gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Unrelenting Flames
card.text: Whenever a red source would deal damage this turn, it deals double that damage instead.

card.name: Twice Burned
card.text: Twice Burned deals 2 damage to up to two target creatures and/or players.

card.name: Devilish Plaything
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 and has "Whenever this creature attacks, you may have target creature defending player controls untap and block it if able."

card.name: Pervasive Aggressor
card.text: Trample, haste

card.name: Empowered Atmosphere
card.text: Whenever a player taps a land for mana, that player adds one mana to his or her mana pool of any type that lands produced and Empowered Atmosphere deals 1 damage to that player.

card.name: Alpha Authority
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has hexproof and can't be blocked by more than one creature.

card.name: Art of Battle
card.text: Target creature you control fights target creature you don't control. Then put two +1/+1 counters on each of those creatures.

card.name: Ancient Restoration
card.text: Destroy all enchantments. You gain 1 life for each enchantment destroyed in this way.

card.name: Powerbloom
card.text: Target creature gets +5/+5 until end of turn.

card.name: Acolyte of Kaj
card.text: Vigilance

card.name: Decorated Warrior
card.text: Vigilance Whenever Decorated Warrior attacks or blocks, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Relic of the Unreal
card.text: {1}, {T}: Exile target card from a graveyard. Then if there are no cards in graveyards, sacrifice Relic of the Unreal and you draw three cards.

card.name: Snow Charm
card.text: Choose one — Snow permanents gain hexproof until end of turn; or untap target snow permanent you control; or tap target nonsnow permanent an opponent controls.

card.name: Kaj, the Summer-Hunter
card.text: Gain life equal to the greatest toughness among creatures you control. Target creature you control gets +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn. Put a 3/3 green and white Cat Soldier creature token onto the battlefield. You get an emblem with "Creatures you control get +5/+5 and have lifelink."

card.name: Cryonova
card.text: Exile all creatures.

card.name: Mountain Surveyor
card.text: Mountainwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.) {R}, Sacrifice a snow land: Mountain Surveyor deals 2 damage to target creature or player and gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Wintry Angel
card.text: Flying Whenever Wintry Angel attacks, you gain 2 life for each nonland snow permanent you control.

card.name: Stutter
card.text: Counter target spell and each other spell that shares a name with it.

card.name: Strahn Truthteller
card.text: Whenever you would draw a card, instead draw three cards then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.

card.name: Master of Absolutes
card.text: Flying Whenever a nonland snow permanent enters the battlefield under your control, draw a card.

card.name: Demonic Possession
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has intimidate. (That creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.) When enchanted creature dies, you may search your library for a Demon creature card, reveal it, and put it onto the battlefield under your control. If you do, shuffle your library.

card.name: Brittlewing Phoenix
card.text: Flying When Brittlewing Phoenix dies, you may pay {1}{S}. If you do, return it to your hand.

card.name: Peaktop Hellkite
card.text: Flying When Peaktop Hellkite enters the battlefield, it deals damage to target creature or player equal to the number of nonland snow permanents you control.

card.name: Wisdom Wheel
card.text: Each player skips his or her draw step. At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player discards his or her hand, then draws cards equal to the number of cards discarded this way plus one.

card.name: Cruel Kahoji
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, choose a creature at random. Cruel Kahoji deals 4 damage to that creature.

card.name: Frostscale Hydra
card.text: Trample Frostscale Hydra enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. Whenever a nonland snow permanent enters the battlefield under your control, double the number of +1/+1 counters on Frostscale Hydra.

card.name: Ironhoof Goliath
card.text: When Ironhoof Goliath enters the battlefield, you may destroy up to one target land, up to one target artifact, and up to one target enchantment.

card.name: Clean Recovery
card.text: Return all creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Strahn, the Frozen Foundation
card.text: {T}: Add {S} to your mana pool. {1}, {T}: Add {S} to your mana pool for each nonland snow permanent you control.

card.name: Blade of Free Will
Chromatic Frostbender
card.text: {S}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

card.name: Snowveil Serpent
card.text: Other snow creatures you control get +1/+1. {1}{S}: Put an ice counter on target nonland permanent. Permanents with ice counters on them are snow in addition to their other types.

card.name: Splinter Symmetry
card.text: For each creature you control, put a creature token that's a copy of that creature onto the battlefield, except that token gains haste and has "At the beginning of the next end step, sacrifice this creature."

card.name: Pestilent Shade
card.text: Whenever a creature dealt damage by Pestilent Shade this turn dies, you may search your library for up to two Swamps and put them onto the battlefield. If you do, shuffle your library. {B}: Pestilent Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Sacred Majesty
card.text: Flash, flying When Sacred Majesty enters the battlefield, you may exile target spell. Players can't cast spells with the same name as cards exiled with Sacred Majesty.

card.name: Earthcore Elemental
card.text: Trample Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, Earthcore Elemental gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is that creature's power.

card.name: Malicious Reaper
card.text: Flying Whenever another creature dies, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with an ice counter on it. That creature is snow in addition to its other types. Whenever Malicious Reaper deals combat damage to a player, gain control of all nonland snow permanents he or she controls.

card.name: Whiptail Masticore
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Whiptail Masticore unless you discard a card. {3}: Whiptail Masticore deals 3 damage to another target creature and 2 damage to itself. {S}: Regenerate Whiptail Masticore.

card.name: Dragon GLC
card.text: Flying {R}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Wurm GLC
card.text: Trample

card.name: Spirit GLC
card.text: Flying

card.name: Fox GLC
card.text: First strike

card.name: Kaj, the Summer Hunter GLC
card.text: Creatures you control get +5/+5 and have lifelink.
